title: The Bugaku dance
brief_description: An introduction to “Bugaku” or Japanese Imperial Court dance and music, which have been preserved in the Imperial Court for centuries. It contains performances of “Ryoo”, a solo dance played with the use of masks, and “Bairo”, a mass dance. Music only - no narration.
